participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and expressive, Jordan enjoys dancing and has a nostalgic connection to her childhood. Her love for music and art reflects her vibrant personality.
participant_1.background: i also like old school hip hop. i take dance lessons once a week. i was born in the early 80 s. i love new kids on the block. my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Passionate and nurturing, Emily finds joy in music and helping others. Her profession as a piano teacher showcases her love for education and creativity.
participant_2.background: my father played violin professionally. i'm a piano teacher on the side. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i volunteer at the homeless shelter.
